valueAlignment.description: Being reliable and devoted to the needs of those around you gives you great satisfaction; you likely do a great deal to keep your close relationships thriving.
valueAlignment.name: benevolence

valueAlignment.description: The sense of security that comes with feeling like you belong highly motivates you. Comfort for you is knowing the people and things you cherish are taken care of.
valueAlignment.name: security

valueAlignment.description: At its essence, Self-Direction is a need for control, mastery, and independence - so itâ€™s no surprise you might relish in choosing your own goals - and honing till they are just right. Likely curious, intelligent and a lover of freedom - you prefer to live by your own rules.
valueAlignment.name: self direction

valueAlignment.description: Power is invaluable. After all, it likely enables you to control the people and situations around you. When you're on top making the decision, you feel most yourself.
valueAlignment.name: power

valueAlignment.description: Broadminded and selfless, you likely focus on bolstering social justice and equality so that the world is more fair and peaceful for all.
valueAlignment.name: universalism

valueAlignment.description: Likely a perfectionist at heart, you strive to be the best you can be. And if you get recognition and approval in the process, that really is the cherry on top.
valueAlignment.name: achievement

valueAlignment.description: The idea of upsetting others or disrupting the status quo likely fills you with dread, so you work hard to bring self-discipline, responsibility and politeness to the table.
valueAlignment.name: conformity

valueAlignment.description: As a person, you care deeply for humility and accepting your place in the world. Most likely you are a religious person and find following your faith to be very important.
valueAlignment.name: tradition

valueAlignment.description: Whether through exploring the world or indulging in your favorite food, you likely love instant gratification and value decisions that reward your senses.
valueAlignment.name: hedonism

valueAlignment.description: The world is a big place and you see the benefits of craving new experiences. On top of a need for variety and stimulation, you may also be a bit daring compared to most. You are likely a go-getter change-maker at heart.
valueAlignment.name: stimulation
